title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. VI, pt. 588 - Rule Making; Miscellaneous Provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. VI, pt. 588 - Rule Making; Miscellaneous Provisions

State Regulations
§ 588.1 - Rule making procedure
§ 588.2 - Declaratory rulings
§ 588.3 - Judicial review of rules
§ 588.4 - Construction of rules
§ 588.5 - Designation of employees or officers
§ 588.6 - Suspension of rules
§ 588.7 - Computation and extension of time
§ 588.8 - Effective date of these rules
§ 588.9 - Cooperative agreements

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. VI, pt. 588

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 804[9], 809[14]; 814[5], 816[3]; Environmental Conservation Law, §
8-0113[3]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
